name: Sonic 2 Megamix
summary: Sonic 2 Megamix is the second installment in the Megamix series of hacks by Team Megamix, being initially intended as a proper sequel to Sonic Megamix. It was created by Tweaker for submission in the 4th Hacking Contest. It features edited palettes, music, levels, and the addition of Shadow the Hedgehog as an alternate skin for Sonic.
